title: LC-ABD Collaboration: Work Package 2 - Damping Rings
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: The research contributed to the ILC Technical Design Report.
findingsText: The final report for this project was submitted to STFC on 30/6/2011. The final report for this project was submitted to STFC on 30/6/2011. Other
